description:
Junta thought he`d never get a girlfriend with his problem. Kotomi thought she`d never get a boyfriend with hers. Sharing similar embarrassing problems, Kotomi and Junta practice together in order to overcome their difficulties, but will that be enough for Kotomi? Meanwhile, Karin tries to convince Ami, and maybe herself, of what`s best for the future.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Want to Give You Everything I Have!
Watashi no Subete o Agetai no!
私のすべてをあげたいの!
